meta_description: We celebrate the automobile and educate the general public, students and enthusiasts regarding the role of the automobile in New York State and in the wider world.
hours_text:
November 5 - April 26

[ Purchase Tickets ](https://saratogaauto.app.neoncrm.com/nx/portal/neonevents/events?path=%2Fportal%2Fevents%2F31497)

## Pontiac: The Dawn of Muscle

## **ADMISSION PRICES**

**Members:** FREE  
**Adults:** $20.00  
**Children 11-18:** $15.00  
**Children 10 & Under: **FREE  
**Students 17+ (with ID):** $15.00  
**Senior Adults 65+:** $15.00  
**Veterans/Active Military:** $15.00

Special Guided Tours are available on select days and times listed below. They are free with admission to the Museum. Wednesdays: 2pm Sundays: 2pm

**NOVEMBER - APRIL:** Wednesday - Sunday: 10AM to 5PM, Closed Monday & Tuesday

**MAY - OCTOBER:** Monday-Sunday: 10AM to 5PM, Open 7 Days a Week 

CLOSED MAJOR HOLIDAYS: New Year’s Eve & Day, Easter, Thanksgiving, Memorial Day, Fourth of July, Labor Day, Independence Day and Christmas Eve & Day.

OTHER MUSEUM CLOSINGS: Our schedule does change during exhibit changeovers and special events. During inclement weather, the Museum follows the Saratoga Springs School District closing and delay schedule. Please call the Museum or check the Museum’s social media platforms to be certain the Museum will be open to the public on the day of your expected visit.

**ACCESSIBILITY AND SPECIAL NEEDS: The Museum is fully ADA accessible.** The entrance lobby is equipped with a wheelchair lift, and an elevator serves the second floor. A courtesy wheelchair is available at the Admissions Desk. 

**PARKING:** Free parking for museum visitors is avai...
admission_text:
## **MUSEUM MEMBERSHIP**

Membership makes the difference! The Saratoga Automobile Museum thrives because of the participation and support of nearly 1,000 active and enthusiastic members. The Museum’s members play an important role in helping us continue our mission  
  
With programs, events, and numerous benefits designed to accommodate a wide range of interests and budgets, a Museum membership offers the best way to get involved. Whether a casual enthusiast, a serious collector, a retiree, a family with kids, a teacher, or a student, you find the right membership package for you.   

20% off memberships for seniors, students teachers, active military, veterans, and law enforcement.

For questions about Museum memberships, please contact: Andrew Hennessey, Office Coordinator at _(518) 401-5187_ or via e-mail at [andrew@saratogaautomuseum.org](mailto:andrew@saratogaautomuseum.org)﻿

[ Click here to Purchase a Museum Membership ](https://saratogaauto.app.neoncrm.com/forms/saratoga-automobile-museum--membership-form)

## The Artists who Sold the Dream…

Few creative partnerships captured the excitement, elegance, and optimism of mid-century motoring like Art Fitzpatrick and Van Kaufman, whose bold, sophisticated illustrations helped define the look of Pontiac and General Motors’ most iconic campaigns. Thanks to the generosity of the GM Heritage Collection, this exhibition features 33 dazzling digital reproductions of their legendary ads — a celebration of style and artistry that made America fall in love with the automobile.

1st Floor - Orientation Theater
